articles.title: Sri Lanka President Calls For "Bilateral Agreement With Whoever We Want" - NDTV
articles.description: Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe said, "There's too much of politics involved for there to be a regional trade agreement in South Asia."
articles.content:
Ranil Wickremesinghe also spoke about the Sri Lanka's debt, much of it owed to China.

articles.title: Singapore's sexagenarian model Ong Bee Yan launches an ageless fashion capsule with local label - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The 66-year-old Singaporean style icon teamed up with Yacht 21 to create a collection that shows style doesn’t have to be pigeonholed by age.
articles.content: When I reached 50, I couldnt find clothes I felt comfortable in. I didnt want to wear clothes that my mum used to wear when she was 50 years old. At the end of the day, I just got stuck with like sho… [+1257 chars]
